Name: Mahsatoi
description:
Mahsatoi is a hardworking woman. She was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1974. For about eight years, she has been busy with honey buying and selling. 

She is married and has four children. Her husband is missing. It was hard for her to raise her children without her husband. She is supported by her son and daughter. 

Mahsatoi has many years of practice of trading honey. She buys from rural areas and sells in the city and nearby districts. She has permanent clients and is satisfied to do business with honey. 

Mahsatoi is asking for financial support from Kiva lenders to buy honey and enlarge her working capital. She awaits your mercy.
